traits.title: Compassionate
traits.description: Gain 3VT every time you spare a life.

traits.title: Hero
traits.description: Gain 3VT every time you risk your life to protect someone.

traits.title: Honest
traits.description: Gain 3VT when your honesty gets you into trouble.

traits.title: Oath
traits.description: You have sworn an oath. Gain 3VT when following it makes your life more complicated.

traits.title: Ambitious
traits.description: Gain 3VT when you make a sacrifice to achieve your life’s ambition.

traits.title: Selfless
traits.description: Gain 3VT every time you make personal sacrifice for the good of someone else.

traits.title: Loyal
traits.description: Gain 3VT when your loyalty makes you vulnerable.

traits.title: Idealist
traits.description: Gain 3VT when your devotion to your ideals makes your life more complicated.

traits.title: Curious
traits.description: Gain 3VT when following your curiosity gets you in trouble.

traits.title: Fearless
traits.description: Gain 3VT when you do something your character fears the most.

traits.title: Prudent
traits.description: Gain 3VT every time you resist a temptation and forego some short-term benefit for the greater good.

traits.title: Open Minded
traits.description: Gain 3VT when your character learns a valuable lesson that changes them in some significant way.

traits.title: Optimist
traits.description: Gain 3VT when your unreasonably rosy view of the world makes you vulnerable.

traits.title: Generous
traits.description: Gain 3VT when your generosity costs you something of value.

traits.title: Troubled
traits.description: Gain 3VT every time indulging in one of your flaws/impulses/temptations puts you at risk/disadvantage, leads to a setback/complication, costs you something important, makes you act against your best interests, makes you suffer a negative effect for the good of the story. Specify one flaw. Arrogance, Greed, Ignorance, Recklessness, Social Awkwardness, Addiction, Indecisiveness, Short Temper, Biggest Fear, etc.

traits.title: Celebrity
traits.description: Gain 3VT every time you become the center of attention in a crowd at a bad moment, when your vanity puts you at a disadvantage.

traits.title: Irreverent
traits.description: Gain 3VT every time you challenge authority (like threatening someone too powerful) and it puts you at a disadvantage.

traits.title: Important Relationships
traits.description: Gain 3VT when some important or difficult relationship in your life (to a person or a group) makes your life more complicated.

traits.title: Notorious
traits.description: You are very well known. You’re hated or loved by a group of people. Gain 3VT when this makes life more difficult for you.

traits.title: Eccentric
traits.description: Gain 3VT when your eccentric or quirky behavior puts you into difficult social situations.

traits.title: Troubled Past
traits.description: Gain 3VT when something from your past comes back to haunt you.

traits.title: Gullible
traits.description: Gain 3VT when you put your trust into the wrong person.

traits.title: Evocative
traits.description: Gain 3VT when you  have a really touching, emotional, dramatic scene that makes other players feel and care about your character.

traits.title: Riveting
traits.description: Gain 3VT every time your actions evoke a specific emotion or reaction from the other players. Pick one reaction, for example “Aww!”, Face-palm, Fist-shaking, Shiver of terror, Fist-pump, “Nooo!”, Getting a laugh from the group, etc.

traits.title: Team Player
traits.description: Gain 3VT when you risk or sacrifice something to help another player to accomplish something they want.

traits.title: Peacemaker
traits.description: Gain 3VT every time you find a non-combat resolution.

traits.title: Detective
traits.description: Gain 3VT every time you solve a difficult puzzle or figure out a secret.

traits.title: Supportive
traits.description: Gain 3VT when you make another character look awesome, when your actions put them in an epic situation.

traits.title: Inventive
traits.description: Gain 3VT when you find a way to use the environment around you in some creative or unusual way.

traits.title: Poet
traits.description: Gain 3VT when you describe what’s going on in a rhyming verse or a limerick.

traits.title: Drawbacks of the Talent
traits.description: Gain 3VT when one of your Talents results in a shortcoming or creates a complication (Strength - your big muscles might make it difficult to crawl through a narrow space. Intimidation - you might scare the target too much, Investigation - you might find it hard to resist going into danger to look for clues, Animal Handling - you might like a weird monster too much, etc.)

traits.title: High Concept
traits.description: Gain 3VT when you make the story more exciting by acting according to a unique and pithy one-liner that best describes your character concept (Broken Heart, My favorite dish is Revenge, Sucker for a Pretty Face, The Boy Who Lived, Posh Goblin, Price Tag on My Head, Amnesiac, Cop on the Edge, Mama's Boy, Paranoid, Righteous Zeal, Morbid Curiosity, Irresistible Beauty, Looking for True Love, etc.)

traits.title: Custom Trait
traits.description: Make up your own custom trait! How can an aspect of your character present a challenge, create a complication, put you into a difficult situation, or otherwise make the story more interesting and exciting? What roleplaying challenge or exercise would you like to play with?  (create this card and then click on edit button to modify it)

talents.title: Strength
talents.description: You're as strong as a bodybuilder. Good at lifting and destroying things.

talents.title: Agility
talents.description: You are very flexible and fast, good at jumping, climbing, gymnastics.

talents.title: Toughness
talents.description: Unbendable will and resilient body, you can survive in difficult situations.

talents.title: Perception
talents.description: You have keen senses, allowing you to notice subtle and hidden things.

talents.title: Stealth
talents.description: You are very good at  sneaking, hiding, avoiding unwanted attention.

talents.title: Sleight of Hand
talents.description: You’re good at manual trickery, physical forms of deception:stealing, planting, concealing, smuggling.

talents.title: Melee Combat
talents.description: You have excellent combat skills.

talents.title: Ranged Weapons
talents.description: You are an excellent marksman.

talents.title: Dodge
talents.description: Move out of the way of danger and keep from getting hit.

talents.title: Insight
talents.description: You are very good at understanding people, figuring out their intentions, reading social cues.

talents.title: Persuasion
talents.description: You are charming, likable, eloquent, good at convincing people.

talents.title: Deception
talents.description: You are cunning, remarkably good at lying, trickery, pretending.

talents.title: Intimidation
talents.description: You’re good at influencing people through threats and inspiring fear.

talents.title: Seduction
talents.description: You've got good game.

talents.title: Leadership
talents.description: You’re great at inspiring people to follow your vision.

talents.title: Diplomacy
talents.description: You’re great at solving problems through non-violent means.

talents.title: Performance
talents.description: Delight audience with your acting, storytelling, dance, other forms of entertainment.

talents.title: Con Artistry
talents.description: Use people's weaknesses against them to obtain money, information, goods, etc.

talents.title: Bartering
talents.description: Convince people to trade and get better deals.

talents.title: Politics
talents.description: You have good insight into political alliances, motivations, plots.

talents.title: Nature
talents.description: You’re good at avoiding natural hazards and navigating wilderness.

talents.title: Animal Handling
talents.description: You are good at dealing with animals.

talents.title: Medicine
talents.description: You understand medicine, know how to treat wounds and diseases.

talents.title: Arcane Knowledge
talents.description: You have deep understanding of magic and arcane arts.

talents.title: Lore
talents.description: Recall facts about the world.

talents.title: Religion
talents.description: You understand religions and gods of the world.

talents.title: Linguistics
talents.description: You’re good at understanding languages.

talents.title: Science
talents.description: You know the answers to questions related to natural science.

talents.title: Investigation
talents.description: Find subtle clues, notice details, make deductions.

talents.title: Gather Information
talents.description: Gather information from rumors and interrogation.

talents.title: Research
talents.description: Find information quickly from books and documents.

talents.title: Crafting
talents.description: You’re good at putting together makeshift devices.

talents.title: Forgery
talents.description: Forge items, documents, or art.

talents.title: Lock Picking
talents.description: Pick simple locks.

talents.title: Disguise
talents.description: Conceal your identity with makeup, clothes, and overall appearance.

talents.title: Navigation
talents.description: Find your way in the wilderness. You can avoid natural hazards, find the closest  shelter, oasis, nest of an animal.

talents.title: Tracking
talents.description: You can follow tracks and identify what kind of creature has left them.

talents.title: Transportation
talents.description: You can drive/pilot any vehicle.

talents.title: Traps
talents.description: You can create, find, disarm traps.

talents.title: Profession
talents.description: You are good at a profession of your choice. You get advantage on all rolls relevant to your area of expertise.

talents.title: In Character
talents.description: You get advantage a roll when you’re acting according to one trait of your choice (choose one of the traits you already have). When using this talent to gain advantage, you don’t gain the 3VT that using a Trait usually gives you, instead you just spend 1VT on using this talent.

talents.title: Custom Talent
talents.description: Come up with your own talent! What other general talent does your character have? What would benefit them in a range of different situations? (create this card and then click on edit button to modify it)

skills.title: Act like you belong
skills.description: Invent a local saying and use it in your conversation with the NPC. It allows you to blend in and appear as a member of the social group NPC belongs to, gaining their trust.

skills.title: Tell a Tale
skills.description: Tell a local myth to the NPC, and explain what the lesson of it is ("Give refuge to strangers", "Help others", "Don't lie", "Forgive people", "Be a fair dealer", etc). NPC will comply with reasonable requests that are in line with the lesson.

skills.title: Inspiring Speech
skills.description: Bolster the spirits of your party by giving an inspiring speech. When completed, your party recovers 3VT.

skills.title: Folk Song
skills.description: You sing a song that kindles strong feelings in the friendly/neutral NPCs nearby (you need to sing a song at the table). This will influence the mood of the people around you to the one of your choice (happy, somber, proud, indignant, etc.)

skills.title: Cheater’s Debate
skills.description: Any facts and figures you make up during the debate will sound very convincing.

skills.title: Spread the Word
skills.description: Spread any rumor. Say a couple of sentences, and they go viral. Not everyone believes them, but everyone is talking about them.

skills.title: Handsome
skills.description: You’re extremely good looking. Spend 1VT to dazzle someone with your beauty.

skills.title: Connections
skills.description: You’re on good terms with a group of people of your choice. They’ll do their best to help you to the best of their ability.

skills.title: Aristocrat
skills.description: Your flawless manners and elegant demeanor make you appear rich and high status.

skills.title: Command
skills.description: Speak a simple two-word command (approach me, drop item, flee, fall down, etc), and a target creature will obey.

skills.title: Yucky
skills.description: Your smell, behavior, or appearance are so repulsive that nobody wants to attack you. Roll the dice, if you roll above a 10 you can make your target puke.

skills.title: Joker
skills.description: Make a joke or a horrible pun, roll the dice. If you roll above 10, your target can’t stop laughing for the next 10 minutes.

skills.title: Grapple
skills.description: You grapple the opponent of your size or smaller. You can hold them for up to 5 minutes.

skills.title: Resilient
skills.description: For the next hour you can’t get tired from physical exertion.

skills.title: Sprinter
skills.description: For the next hour you can run as fast as a horse.

skills.title: Leap
skills.description: Jump up to 6 meters forward and 4 meters upward in any direction.

skills.title: Darkvision
skills.description: For the next hour you can see in pitch darkness as if it’s an overcast day.

skills.title: Eagle Eye
skills.description: You have superhuman vision, you can see the tiniest objects extremely far away.

skills.title: Owl’s Ear
skills.description: You have hypersensitive hearing. Hear things that are very far away, hear through walls.

skills.title: Sense Danger
skills.description: Notice all the imminent threats around you.

skills.title: Sneak Attack
skills.description: If the creature doesn't notice you, your attack deals double damage.

skills.title: Counterattack
skills.description: When someone deals you damage you can attack them back right away.

skills.title: Ricochet
skills.description: Shoot around the corners by bouncing arrows off the walls.

skills.title: Battle Stomp
skills.description: Smash your weapon into the ground, knock down everyone around you.

skills.title: Heavy Armor
skills.description: Double the effectiveness of heavy armor.

skills.title: Build Shelter
skills.description: When camping in the wilderness, use the nearby flora to build a shelter. It hides your presence from the hostile creatures, and gives you an early warning about their approach.

skills.title: Pet Pal
skills.description: You can speak with animals.

skills.title: Remedy
skills.description: Scavenge a nearby area and find a plant-based remedy for an ailment. You find enough for a single dose. The remedy cures temporary illness and eliminates poison.

skills.title: Mend
skills.description: Fix a broken mundane object.

skills.title: Musician
skills.description: When you’re playing a musical instrument - roll the dice. If you roll above 10, everybody around you can’t resist dancing.

skills.title: Boyscout
skills.description: You’re always prepared! Search through your pockets and find any mundane item of your choice.

skills.title: Eidetic Memory
skills.description: You have perfect memory.

skills.title: Identify
skills.description: Figure out properties of an object and how to use them. Learn whether the object is affected by spells and what they are.

skills.title: Examine Creature
skills.description: Figure out the creature’s strengths, vulnerabilities, special powers.

skills.title: Magic Trick
skills.description: You can do what David Blaine can do. Any simple magic trick that isn’t actually magical in nature.

skills.title: Stealthy Spellcasting
skills.description: For the next 10 minutes you can cast spells in a way that is undetectable by the people around you.

skills.title: Brew Poison
skills.description: You can brew poison from common ingredients.

skills.title: Craft an Item
skills.description: Once per day you can craft a simple mundane item.

skills.title: Talk your Way Out
skills.description: If you're caught doing something prohibited - you can come up with a good excuse and talk your way out of the situation.

skills.title: Examine Corpse
skills.description: Determine the exact cause and time of it’s death.

skills.title: Stalk
skills.description: You can carefully stalk a chosen target without getting noticed.

skills.title: Ambush
skills.description: Prepare an ambush. When you attack the target they will be surprised, and everyone in your group can take an action before they react.

skills.title: Improvised Weapons
skills.description: You can make a weapon out of anything. The improvised weapon deals 4 damage, and is usable in one fight.

skills.title: Sick Burn
skills.description: Your insults deal 4 damage (you need to come up with a clever and original insult every time you use this skill.)

skills.title: Echolocation
skills.description: When you’re inside a building or a cave you can make a loud noise and interpret the echo, giving you a vague overview of the shape of the location.

skills.title: First Aid
skills.description: If your ally has just passed out, you can awaken them, leaving them with one VT.

skills.title: Frighten Animals
skills.description: Make yourself appear threatening, making all the nearby non-magical creatures run away.

skills.title: Provoke
skills.description: Attract the attention of all the enemies. They will attack you instead of your friends until the battle is over or they take damage from someone else.

skills.title: Parry
skills.description: Parry a physical attack against you.

skills.title: Investigate
skills.description: When investigating a crime scene, you can discover an important clue, a motive of the criminal, or where they’re headed next (choose one).

skills.title: Deadeye
skills.description: Allows you accurately shoot at the tiny objects extremely far away.

skills.title: Quickshot
skills.description: Allows you to shoot twice during your turn.

skills.title: Impossible Mask
skills.description: You can craft a mask like in Mission Impossible.

skills.title: Tell the Tale
skills.description: Tell an amazing tale from your past adventures. Roll the dice. If you beat 15, everyone believes you 100%. If you beat 10 - people are entertained and you are now well liked. If you roll below 10 - they consider you a liar and a charlatan.

skills.title: Actor
skills.description: You can flawlessly portray any dramatic emotion. Anyone who sees your performance will believe that you’re completely sincere.

skills.title: Conceal Object
skills.description: Conceal an object of your choice, it will be impossible to discover that you have it until you use it.

skills.title: Smash
skills.description: Destroy any object up to the size of a barrel in one hit (if it’s not being held by someone).

skills.title: Deflect
skills.description: Use your melee weapon to deflect any attack (including magical ones) back to it’s target. Roll the dice. If you roll above 10 you succeed, otherwise it’s just dodged.

skills.title: Suggestion
skills.description: You are extremely convincing. You can suggest a course of activity (limited to a sentence or two), and the target person will purses the course of action you described to the best of its ability. The suggestion must be worded in such a manner as to make the course of action sound reasonable.

skills.title: Fake Death
skills.description: Appear to be dead for the next 30 minutes.

skills.title: Live on the Edge
skills.description: You gain advantage on all rolls when you have 4VT or less.

skills.title: Inspire
skills.description: Give your friend a compliment, and they will have an advantage on the next roll.

skills.title: Gossip
skills.description: Say something bad about a person, and your target will be hostile towards them.

skills.title: Animal Buddy
skills.description: Recruit a nearby animal, they will follow your orders to the best of their ability. It can't be smaller than a mouse or bigger than a horse. You can have only one animal partner at a time. If you get separated, it will try to find you. They have 6 HP and can make basic attacks for 2 damage. If the animal is hostile towards you - it won’t follow your orders, but you can calm it down.

skills.title: Authority
skills.description: When you quickly wave a badge or a  document in front of someone, it will appear to be whatever credentials they expect to see in this situation.

skills.title: Remoralization
skills.description: Give a profound and inspiring speech, making the target person act in alignment with their values. They will stop doing anything they feel guilty for, and will do their best to do the right thing. Lasts a day.

skills.title: Confuse
skills.description: Say or do something so confusing that the person’s thinking will be extremely slow while they’re processing it.

skills.title: Place a Bounty
skills.description: Place a bounty on an ordinary person (not a king or a villain). Offer a valuable item as payment (a cool one or better). Roll the dice. If you roll 10 or - the deed will be done by the end of the game. If you roll below 10 - the target learns about the bounty and places one on your head.

skills.title: Recruit
skills.description: Command a nearby commoner to assist you. They will follow your commands to the best of their ability for the next day.

skills.title: Brew a Potion
skills.description: Once per day you can brew any Nifty or Cool potion.

skills.title: Distress Signal
skills.description: When in the wilderness, you can build a distress signal that can be seen by Rangers. Within the next day, you will meet an NPC Ranger who comes to your aid.

skills.title: Sense Motive
skills.description: You can read social cues so well that you can determine whether someone is lying to you, whether something odd is going on, or to assess someone’s trustworthiness.

skills.title: Dual Wielding
skills.description: Use two weapons at the same time.

skills.title: Silver Tongue
skills.description: You’re amazing at flattering people. When compliment someone, they can’t help but to like you.

skills.title: Potion Master
skills.description: Brew a potion with the effect of any Nifty or Cool spell (takes 3 hours).

skills.title: Throw Anything
skills.description: You can use any creature or an object as a thrown weapon. You can also throw them carefully, in a way that doesn’t deal damage.

skills.title: Martial Arts Master
skills.description: You can do anything Jackie Chan can do. You are a true ninja. Run on water, run on walls, instantly master any combat tactic you see. You no longer suffer falling damage.

skills.title: Super Senses
skills.description: Your eyesight and hearing are supernaturally sharp. You can hear the quietest noises, see the tiniest details extremely far away.

skills.title: Final Push
skills.description: Once per day through the sheer force of will you can restore all of your VP, but in an hour it will drop down to 1 from the exhaustion.

skills.title: Gather Intel
skills.description: Infiltrate the person's office or home, and use your skills to reveal one of those things: The identity of an important associate, a location they will travel to (with the time and date), a secret that would embarrass them if revealed, their true feelings about you or your party, who they’re loyal to.

skills.title: Bond with a Weapon
skills.description: You can choose one favorite weapon, doubling it’s damage when you use this skill.

skills.title: Track Down
skills.description: Ask around, and people will do their best to help you find an item, a person, or a creature.

skills.title: Superintelligence
skills.description: Once per day you can describe a contingency plan that you have put in place retroactively, having predicted that this situation is going to occur.

skills.title: Hulk
skills.description: You are superhumanly strong, like Hulk or Mr. Incredible.

skills.title: Spider Man
skills.description: You are capable of superhuman, spider-man-level acrobatics.

skills.title: Find an Intern
skills.description: You find an aspiring adventurer looking to gain some experience.  They will follow you around and do their best to obey your orders and provide assistance.

skills.title: Impersonation
skills.description: You can create a fake identity of a powerful or a high status person. It can’t be the already existing person (like a King). It allows you to enter restricted areas, give orders to people below your station, live lavish lifestyle.

skills.title: Master
skills.description: You’re the best in the world at a profession of your choice.

skills.title: Horrifying
skills.description: You are so horrifying you can break the wills of most people and creatures.

skills.title: Value Change
skills.description: Give a life-changing speech. Alters one of the person’s fundamental values, can turn an evil person good or flip an enemy to your side.

skills.title: Forensics
skills.description: You can use do whatever a modern forensics lab can do.

skills.title: Quick Learner
skills.description: You can learn any complicated task just by watching someone do it. You’ll be able to perform it for the next day.

skills.title: Craft Anything
skills.description: Once per month you can invent and craft a fantasy equivalent of any item from our world.

skills.title: Master of the Blade
skills.description: Your weapon is infinitely sharp and can cut through anything.

skills.title: Master Liar
skills.description: You are the best liar in the world, you can convince almost anyone that almost anything is true.

skills.title: Fame
skills.description: You are well known. You can choose what reputation you have in this region (Hero, Villain, Philanthropist, Sex Symbol, etc.)

skills.title: Wealthy
skills.description: You can live a lavish lifestyle and do what a rich person can do (you can’t use this skill to gain items, only for roleplaying).

skills.title: Tough as Nails
skills.description: You take only half the damage from physical attacks.

skills.title: Magic Resistance
skills.description: You take only half the damage from spells.

skills.title: Artificer
skills.description: Once per session you can imbue a non-magical item with the power of a spell you know.

skills.title: Build a Creature
skills.description: Craft an artifical creature like a robot or a golem. It takes you a month to build one.

skills.title: Custom Skill
skills.description: Come up with your custom skill! Think of them as non-magical spells, what kind of specific thing do you want your character to be able to do?  (create this card and then click on edit button to modify it)

spells.title: Minor Illusion
spells.description: Create an illusion of an object (no larger than a barrel) or a sound within 50 meters, in your line of sight.

spells.title: Darkness
spells.description: Create a field of magical darkness 10 meters in diameter.

spells.title: Message
spells.description: Telepathically send a message to the nearby creature, they can respond back.

spells.title: Charm Person
spells.description: The person regards you as their friend for 1 hour. When the spell ends, they know they’ve been charmed.

spells.title: Summon Familiar
spells.description: Summon a small creature who will be your pet and a friend. You can communicate with it telepathically, give it commands, see through its eyes, hear what it hears, cast spells through it. If the creature takes damage it disappears until you resummon it.

spells.title: Transfiguration
spells.description: Turn an object into any mundane object of the same size made out of the same material.

spells.title: Intwine
spells.description: Use nearby grass, vines, and tree branches as if they were your own limbs.

spells.title: Minor Telekinesis
spells.description: Slowly levitate small objects.

spells.title: Dig
spells.description: Quickly dig a hole or a tunnel.

spells.title: Small Fireball
spells.description: Sets stuff on fire. Hold in your hand as a light source. Deals 2 damage.

spells.title: Freeze Pulse
spells.description: Freezes liquids, covers objects with ice, creates ice on the ground (can do what Frozone from Incredibles can do).

spells.title: Wall of Ice
spells.description: Create an ice wall, 10x10 meters. Window is optional.

spells.title: Disguise Self
spells.description: You create an illusion around yourself - an appearance of any person you’ve seen. Lasts 1 hour.

spells.title: Mold Earth
spells.description: You can target an area (5x5 meter cube) of loose earth, you can instantaneously excavate it, move it along the ground, and deposit it up to 5 meters away.

spells.title: Walk on Walls/Ceiling
spells.description: For the next 20 minutes you can walk on any surface at any angle as if it was regular floor.

spells.title: Jet of Wind
spells.description: Create a jet of wind powerful enough to knock people off their feet.

spells.title: Ascend
spells.description: Propel the target object or creature (including yourself) directly upwards (up to 20 meters).

spells.title: Feather Fall
spells.description: Slows down your fall to the speed of a falling feather.

spells.title: Skywrite
spells.description: Cause up to 10 words to form in the sky you can see (made of clouds).

spells.title: Alarm
spells.description: Set an alarm against unwanted intrusion. Choose a door, a window, or a 10x10 meter. Until the spell ends, an alarm alerts you whenever anyone enters the warded area.

spells.title: Shroud of Silence
spells.description: No sound can be created within or pass through a 10-meter-radius sphere centered on a point of your choice. Lasts 1 hour.

spells.title: Spectral Weapon
spells.description: Create a floating weapon that can fly up to an enemy and make a melee attack. Deals 4 damage. Lasts 1 minute.

spells.title: Enlarge/Reduce
spells.description: Make the object or a creature grow or shrink to 4 times it’s size.

spells.title: Protect
spells.description: Make an object invulnerable to damage for the next day. Make a window, door, or an object (like a chest) impossible to open. You know the password that unlocks it.

spells.title: Change Luck
spells.description: Once per session you can replace a 20 roll with a 1 or vice versa.

spells.title: Dispel Magic
spells.description: Dispels magical effects and or enchantments on a target.

spells.title: Annoying Cloud
spells.description: Summon a cloud that will float above the target's head, rain on them, distracting them and impairing their vision for the next hour.

spells.title: Join
spells.description: You create a line of sticky silk, joining two distant objects or surfaces together. The thread is strong enough to handle a weight of an elephant.

spells.title: Awaken Item
spells.description: Bestow the gift of sentience and speech on an item. It has the personality of your choice.

spells.title: Unseen Servant
spells.description: Create an invisible, stupid, slow creature that can perform simple tasks and follow your orders. Lasts for 1 hour.

spells.title: Secret Message
spells.description: Write a message visible only to the people you choose.

spells.title: Catapult
spells.description: Propel a small object you can see in the direction of your choice with the force of a thrown rock.

spells.title: Glue
spells.description: Instantly glues 2 objects to each other. Lasts 1 hour.

spells.title: Expelliarmus
spells.description: Causes whatever the opponent is holding to fly out of their hands.

spells.title: Grease
spells.description: Cover an object or a surface in grease, making it frictionless.

spells.title: Daylight
spells.description: During the night, you can make it bright as day in an area the size of a village.

spells.title: Firehose
spells.description: A stream of water pours out of your hand as if it's a firehose. Lasts 10 minutes.

spells.title: Bend Space
spells.description: Alter direction of projectiles and small flying objects, change their course up to 90 degrees in any direction.

spells.title: Invisibility
spells.description: Turn yourself, a willing creature, or an object (no larger than a horse) invisible for the next 20 minutes.

spells.title: Locate Object
spells.description: Describe an object that is familiar to you. You can sense  the direction to the object's location, as long as that object is within 300 meters of you.

spells.title: Read Surface Thoughts
spells.description: For the next 10 minutes you can hear and understand what a target creature within 50 meters is thinking.

spells.title: Levitate
spells.description: Slowly lifts the target vertically above the ground, up to 15 meters. The target can weight up to 300 kg.

spells.title: Push/Pull Metal
spells.description: Push metal directly away from you, or pull it towards you. If the object is lighter than you, the object moves, if it’s heavier - you move. If an object is thrown at a speed, deals 4 damage.

spells.title: Trigger
spells.description: Pick one of the spells you know that will activate when a certain condition is met. Whenever that happens within the designated area(15-meter-radius) the spell will be cast.

spells.title: Velocity Ward
spells.description: Nothing can move faster than a falling feather within a sphere of 15 meter radius for the next 15 minutes .

spells.title: Elasticity
spells.description: For the next 10 minutes you can do what Elastigirl from Incredibles can do.

spells.title: Change Momentum
spells.description: Halt, decrease, increase, or reverse the momentum of a moving object.

spells.title: Major Illusion
spells.description: Create an illusory object no larger than an elephant, complete with sounds, smells, movement.

spells.title: Sense Magic
spells.description: You can sense the magic auras of any spells, items, or creatures within 200 meters around you. You'll get a vague sense of what they are, and their general direction.

spells.title: Familiar Transposition
spells.description: Swap places with your familiar.

spells.title: Plane of Force
spells.description: Create 30x30 meters invisible wall of force (at any angle). Lasts for 30 minutes or until it takes 10 damage. Can support up to 500kg of weight.

spells.title: Transfiguration
spells.description: Turn an object into any mundane object of the same size made out of the same material.

spells.title: Reverse Gravity
spells.description: Reverse gravity inside 10x10 meter cube in your line of sight.

spells.title: Lightning Bolt
spells.description: A bolt of lightning strikes it from the sky or from your hands, dealing damage, melting metallic objects, and stunning the target creature for 1 minute. It's unable to move or do anything.

spells.title: Quicksand
spells.description: Turn into quicksand a 10x10 meters piece of ground in front of you.

spells.title: Produce Emotion
spells.description: Make the target feel happy, sad, angry, smitten, afraid, insecure, etc.

spells.title: Counterspell
spells.description: Interrupt a spell being cast by another mage.

spells.title: Bestow Spell
spells.description: Give the target an ability to use one of the spells you know once.

spells.title: Raise a Zombie
spells.description: Raises a zombie.

spells.title: Vampirism
spells.description: Recover 5VT by drinking the blood of a sentient creature you've just killed. If you have this spell, you can't walk into houses uninvited, and you lose 1VT for every hour you are under direct sunlight.

spells.title: Turn into Creature
spells.description: Touch a willing non-magical creature  to “acquire” it’s form. Now you can turn into this creature for up to an hour.

spells.title: Phantasmal Force
spells.description: Target a single person or a creature, create an incredibly realistic illusion including sound, temperature, and other stimuli. The target will treat it as if it was real, and can even take damage from it.

spells.title: Fire Weapon
spells.description: Casting this on a melee weapon or an arrow will wreathe it in flame, doubling it’s damage for the next 30 minutes. Things touched by the weapon are set on fire.

spells.title: Accio
spells.description: Summon any object within 300 meters towards you. You don’t need to know it’s location, but you need to be able to picture it in your mind.

spells.title: Petrify
spells.description: Turns a non-magical creature or an object (no larger than a barrel) you’re touching into stone for the next 5 minutes.

spells.title: Summon Item
spells.description: Mark an object or an item (no larger than 2x2 meters). Whenever you cast this spell, it will teleport to your hand (or in front of you) from wherever it is.

spells.title: Summon Creature
spells.description: Summon a non-magical animal no larger than a cow. It obeys your commands. Disappears within an hour.

spells.title: Life Transfer
spells.description: Gift your VT to the target person or creature. For every 4VT you spend they gain 3VT.

spells.title: Cat Form
spells.description: For the next hour you turn into a cat.

spells.title: Glance
spells.description: You can peer into the recent past. Ask about specific event that happened in your location in the past day, and get a small piece of information about that event.

spells.title: Impair Senses
spells.description: Blind or deafen your target for  the next hour.

spells.title: Change Text
spells.description: Change any written text to the text of your choice.

spells.title: Grease
spells.description: Cover an object or a surface in grease, making it frictionless.

spells.title: Oracle
spells.description: You can ask the gods one question and receive an honest Yes or No answer. The GM will say yes, no, or shrug if it's impossible to answer.

spells.title: Recall
spells.description: After you cast the spell in a location, you and your group can teleport back to it once.

spells.title: Magic Voice
spells.description: Produces a sound of your choice or a voice delivering a message (no longer than 25 words, delivered over as long as 10 minutes). Cast this spell on an object, and describe the circumstances under which the spell will trigger. The trigger should be something visual or audible that occurs within 10 meters around the object. You can choose for the spell to end once it delivers the message, or repeat every time the trigger occurs. For example, you could instruct the voice to speak when any creature moves within 10 meters of the object or when a silver bell rings within 10 meters of it.

spells.title: Phasing
spells.description: Become immaterial (like a ghost) for the next 5 secnods. Walk through doors, let attacks pass through you.

spells.title: Sail the Wind
spells.description: Turn into a cloud of fog. You can slowly drift in any direction of your choice. Lasts an hour.

spells.title: Technomancy
spells.description: Control mechanical and electrical devices with your mind.

spells.title: Fly
spells.description: Grant the power of flight to the target creature (including yourself). The target can fly at a speed of a bird for the next 10 minutes.

spells.title: Misty Step
spells.description: Instantly teleport a short-distance (a stone's throw, line of sight. Think Nightcrawler from X-Men).

spells.title: Greater Telekinesis
spells.description: Levitate human-sized objects and creatures (not including yourself). Throwing an object/creature deals 5 damage to the target and to the object.

spells.title: Veil
spells.description: Create a static illusion no larger than 100 meters in any direction. Like a building, an oasis, a pile of treasure, etc. When a creature touches the illusion they can no longer see it.

spells.title: Auto Illusion
spells.description: Create an illusory person or a creature that can perform simple tasks you give it. It lives for a day, and can travel any distance away from you. When it's nearby, you can control it telepathically.

spells.title: Commune with the Dead
spells.description: Touch a dead person or a creature to summon their ghost. You can communicate with them for the next 10 minutes.

spells.title: Tiny Hut
spells.description: An immobile force field 10 meters in diameter springs up around you. It’s impenetrable from the outside but not from the inside. The spell ends if you leave the area.

spells.title: Anti-magic Ward
spells.description: Magic doesn’t work within a sphere of 15 meter radius.

spells.title: Slow Time
spells.description: Makes time run 10x slower within a sphere of 15-meter radius.

spells.title: Scry
spells.description: See and hear the target person or a creature, and their surroundings.

spells.title: Animate Objects
spells.description: Objects come to life and obey your commands.

spells.title: Invade Dreams
spells.description: You can reach into people’s dreams. Taking damage in a dream deals it in real life.

spells.title: Telepathy
spells.description: Create a telepathic link with any willing creature. You can share any thoughts and sensations.

spells.title: Command Monster
spells.description: Give the creature or a monster a command it must obey.

spells.title: Imitate Spell
spells.description: You can cast the last spell you have seen someone else cast.

spells.title: Read Memories
spells.description: Search through the unconscious creature's mind, pulling out 15 minutes of memories.

spells.title: Erase Memory
spells.description: Erase 15 minutes of memory of an unconscious creature.

spells.title: Speed
spells.description: For the next 2 seconds the time flows 100 times slower for you, so it feels to you like 3 minutes (Quicksilver powers).

spells.title: Control Bugs
spells.description: You can sense and control all the insects within 100 meter radius for the next hour.

spells.title: Split
spells.description: Splits you into two identical clones. Each clone has 50% of your vitality points. Sustaining a clone takes 2 VT per hour. The clones can fight and use magic (including splitting into more clones). When a clone takes any damage it disappears, it's memories instantly merged into the remaining clones. When there's only one remains - it becomes the "original" you, keeping the memories of all the copies.

spells.title: Bestow Sentience
spells.description: Touch a non-sentient creature, and bestow the gift of sentience and intelligence onto it.

spells.title: Turn into Monster
spells.description: You can turn into a monster or a magical creature of your choice.

spells.title: Implant Memory
spells.description: Implant a false memory into an unconscious creature (the memory can be at most 15 minutes long).

spells.title: Greater Polymorph
spells.description: You can turn the target (a person or an object) into any creature for an hour.

spells.title: Time Stop
spells.description: You stop the time for everyone but yourself. The spell ends if you interact with any creature or an object they’re wearing or carrying.

spells.title: Natural Disaster
spells.description: Summon a natural disaster - a storm, a hurricane, or a blizzard.

spells.title: Greater Teleportation
spells.description: Teleport any object a creature to any point within 100 meters.

spells.title: Second Chance
spells.description: Teleport up to 60 seconds into the past, and replay what just happened differently.

spells.title: Greater Transfiguration
spells.description: Turn any creature into a different creature or an object and vice versa. Lasts an hour.

spells.title: Open Portal
spells.description: Open two connected portals within your line of sight. Works like portal gun from “Portal”.

spells.title: Conjure a Fortress
spells.description: Create a mighty fortress. It has turrets that deal 8 damage.

spells.title: Fidelius Charm
spells.description: Perfectly conceal one location of your choice. It becomes invisible, intangible, undetectable by anyone unless the secret of it’s location is shared with them.

spells.title: Custom Spell
spells.description: Come up with your own spell! (create this card and then click on edit button to modify it)

items.title: Nifty Spellbook
items.description: Allows you to learn one Nifty spell.

items.title: Nifty Skillbook
items.description: Allows you to learn one Nifty skill.

items.title: Cool Spellscroll
items.description: Allows to cast one Cool spell once (specify spell).

items.title: Cool Brain Juice
items.description: A juice harvested from the brain of an expert. Drinking it allows you to use a Cool skill once (specify one skill).

items.title: Friendship Bracelets
items.description: Magical walkie-talkie. Enables you to talk telepathically to anybody who has one (within 300 meters).

items.title: Immovable rod
items.description: Activating it makes it magically fixed in place. Until someone deactivates it, the rod doesn't move, even if it is defying gravity.

items.title: Darkvision goggles
items.description: See in the darkness as if it was daylight.

items.title: Ultimate Lockpick
items.description: When you insert it into any lock, it morphs into the key that fits.

items.title: Small Vitality Potion
items.description: Restores 5 VT.

items.title: Smoke Potion
items.description: Creates a huge cloud of black smoke when spilled.

items.title: Catnip
items.description: When spilled attracts all the cats within 100km radius.

items.title: Invisibility Potion
items.description: Turns you invisible for 10 minutes.

items.title: Anti-Gravity Potion
items.description: Drinker isn't affected by gravity for an hour.

items.title: Falcon Potion
items.description: Turns you into a falcon for 30 minutes.

items.title: Flask of Oil
items.description: Make things slippery. You can set it on fire.

items.title: Vial of Acid
items.description: Burns through objects.

items.title: Chloroform
items.description: The one who inhales it instantly falls asleep for 1 hour

items.title: Infrared goggles
items.description: Add infrared vision that lets you see an outline of things that are generating heat nearby. Work through walls.

items.title: Portable Hole
items.description: A round black piece of fine silk, 5 meters in diameter. When unfolded creates a 5-meter-deep hole. Regardless of contents it weighs nothing.

items.title: All or nothing coin
items.description: Once per day instead of rolling a die you flip a coin. Heads critical success, tails critical failure.

items.title: The Scope of Fears
items.description: Looking through this glass at a creature will tell you what the creature fears most, but will also tell the creature your greatest fear.

items.title: Horseshoe of Attraction
items.description: Turns into a powerful magnet when activated. Can swith polarity and repel objects instead. Can be activated telepathically, from a distance of up to 50 meters.

items.title: Ring of Crawlies
items.description: Allows you to control any single insect within your line of sight.

items.title: Mini Lighthouse
items.description: Creates a small beam of light that can be seen for miles.

items.title: Bottomless Mug
items.description: Can hold a swimming-pool-worth of any liquid.

items.title: Howler
items.description: A magical letter, will scream it’s contents once delivered.

items.title: Alarm Pebble
items.description: A small rock, will alert the holder when anything comes within 15 meters of it.

items.title: Spring Shoes
items.description: Allow you to jump 10 times normal distance.

items.title: Melee Weapon
items.description: A simple melee weapon of your choice (Sword, Dagger, Axe, Whip, etc.)

items.title: Ranged Weapon
items.description: A simple ranged weapon of your choice (Bow, Crossbow, Throwing Dagger, Spear, Dart, etc.)

items.title: Staff of Druid
items.description: Strike earth, and a fountain of water will shoot up from that location for the next 10 minutes.

items.title: Leather Armor
items.description: Basic armor. Reduces damage from physical attacks by 1.

items.title: Wizard's Robes
items.description: Reduces damage from spells by 1.

items.title: Grappling Hook Gun
items.description: Shoots the grappling hook to the distance of up to 50 meters, reels it back in.

items.title: Spyglass
items.description: Helps you see farther.

items.title: Bear Trap
items.description: Perfect for setting traps.

items.title: Artist’s Tools
items.description: A set of tools of your choice - a musical instrument, paint brushes, sculpting clay, cooking supplies, etc.

items.title: Trampoline
items.description: Things that fall on it bounce back up.

items.title: Daily Cypress
items.description: A magic newspaper. Always shows you the most recent news headlines.

items.title: Anyrobe
items.description: A robe that transforms into any set of clothes of your choice.

items.title: Swap Cube
items.description: You can swap the cube with an object no larger or heavier than a barrel within clear line of sight (can't be used on objects that are being worn/used/held by someone.)

items.title: Bullseye Dart
items.description: Can hit any target within 50 meters with infinite precision. Deals 4 damage.

items.title: Spy's Monocle
items.description: When pressed against the surface (like a wall or a door, no thicker than 30cm) turns into a hole you can see through. The hole can't be seen from the other side.

items.title: Cool Spellbook
items.description: Allows you to learn one Cool spell.

items.title: Cool Skillbook
items.description: Allows you to learn one Cool skill.

items.title: Epic Spellscroll
items.description: Allows to cast one Epic spell once (specify spell).

items.title: Epic Brain Juice
items.description: A juice harvested from the brain of an expert. Drinking it allows you to use an Epic skill once (specify one skill).

items.title: Fairy Dust
items.description: Allows you to imbue an item with one of the spells you know. The item will be able to cast the spell once per day. Consumable, can be used only once.

items.title: Refilling Flask
items.description: Refills itself every midnight with whatever liquid was last in it. Works with potions.

items.title: Clay Golem
items.description: Slow and stupid servant, capable of obeying simple commands.

items.title: Unlabelled package
items.description: Mysterious package. When you unwrap it, you can declare what was contained inside. It can be anything, as long as it's no more valuable than a horse or a good sword. If you name something too valuable/powerful, the box returns the closest thing that fits into the value range (if you ask for a potion of immortality, it might return a health potion or a spell scroll).

items.title: Ring of Spell Storing
items.description: Cast a spell on the ring to store it. Anyone who wears the ring can now cast this spell once. Stores up to 3 spells.

items.title: Ring of Tracking
items.description: The owner of the ring always knows it’s location.

items.title: Needler
items.description: A throwing dagger that returns back into your hand once it hits or misses the target. Stays hidden when the wielder is searched.

items.title: Loyal Boomerang
items.description: After saying the command word the boomerang returns to your hand (from anywhere in the world).

items.title: Anysword
items.description: An empty hilt. When activated, instantly morphs into any melee weapon of your choice. Deals 5 damage

items.title: Obsidian Sword
items.description: A pitch black sword. Deals 6 damage, adds bonus dice to your attack rolls.

items.title: Blunderbuss
items.description: Old-timey Gun. Takes a minute to reload. Deals 6 damage.

items.title: Grenade
items.description: Deals 8 damage to everyone around it.

items.title: Elemental Arrow
items.description: Fire arrow, ice arrow, water arrow, or a smoke arrow.

items.title: Silver Fly
items.description: Send it anywhere within 30 meters from you, see and hear through it's senses.

items.title: Ropey
items.description: A sentient piece of rope. 50ft. As smart as a puppy. Obeys simple commands (coil, uncoil, tie a knot, crawl).

items.title: Ring of Sending
items.description: Send a telepathic 25-word message to anyone you have ever met.The recipient can send you a 25-word reply. Works twice per day.

items.title: Shrinking Potion
items.description: The drinker shrinks to be 20 times smaller for 20 minutes.

items.title: Potion of Body Switching
items.description: When two people drink this potion, it swaps their minds freaky-friday style for 2 hours.

items.title: Small Vitality Crystal
items.description: Automatically accumulates energy. Use it once per day to recover 4VT.

items.title: Book of Oath
items.description: A vow written in this book can’t be broken.

items.title: Cape of  Teleportation
items.description: Allows you to teleport anywhere within 100 meters once per day.

items.title: Portable Direwolf
items.description: A small wooden figure of a direwolf. When activated, turns into the actual animal.

items.title: Magic Tent
items.description: Looks like a spacious and comfy house once you get in.

items.title: Orb of Illusion
items.description: Records the environment around it, when placed on the ground plays back the illusion of the recording (like a hologram).

items.title: Chalk of Doors
items.description: Draw a door on a solid surface, it will open to the last door you’ve stepped through.

items.title: Snake Tube
items.description: Conjures one snake per day.

items.title: Handy Handbag
items.description: Sprouts tentacles and follows it’s owner when they’re not looking.

items.title: Resizable Crate
items.description: Big wooden crate, when activated it shrinks itself and it’s contents down to the size of a coin. Can fit up to 2 people.

items.title: Hoverboard
items.description: Floats 30cm above the ground, frictionless, supports any weight.

items.title: Pokeball
items.description: Stores a friendly or defeated animal.

items.title: Jacket of Useful Things
items.description: Can produce any small cheap mundane item from it’s pockets.

items.title: Wingsuit
items.description: Allows you to glide through the air.

items.title: Bag of Gold
items.description: Can be used to live a lavish lifestyle for a month, or traded for something valuable.

items.title: Tea of Shared Dreams
items.description: When multiple people drink it and go to sleep, they will find themselves in a shared dream.

items.title: Polyjuice Potion
items.description: Drop someone’s hair into it, and drinking this potion will turn you into that person or creature for 30 minutes.

items.title: Ant-Man Potion
items.description: You shrink down to the size of an ant, while retaining the strength of a human. Lasts for 1 hour.

items.title: Portkey
items.description: When activated, teleports anyone who touches it to the location of your choice. Can be used once.

items.title: Epic Spellbook
items.description: Allows you to learn one Epic spell.

items.title: Epic Skillbook
items.description: Allows you to learn one Epic skill.

items.title: Supreme Brain Juice
items.description: A juice harvested from the brain of an expert. Drinking it allows you to use an Supreme skill once (specify one skill).

items.title: Supreme Spellscroll
items.description: Allows to cast one Supreme spell once (specify spell).

items.title: Teleportation pyramids
items.description: 2 small pyramids. Activating one pyramid teleports anyone who touches it to the location of the other pyramid.

items.title: Crown of Eyes
items.description: Activate it to see through the eyes of all living creatures in 150 meter radius around you for up to 10 minutes. 5VP to activate.

items.title: Meeseeks Box
items.description: Press a button, name a simple task, it will create a helpful servant. The Meeseek lives until he accomplishes the simple task (up to an hour). If the task proves to be too difficult, he may turn on you out of frustration. 6VT to activate.

items.title: Marauder's Map
items.description: Reveals the floor plan of the area you're in, with labeled moving dots of the creatures inside.

items.title: Truth Serum
items.description: One who drinks it can’t tell lies for an hour.

items.title: Flying Broom
items.description: Soar through the air.

items.title: Wizard’s Tower
items.description: Once per week you can teleport it to a new location.

items.title: Emerald bug
items.description: Activate it, and for the next 5 days you will always know it’s location, and be able to hear what’s going on around it.

items.title: Sable
items.description: Black glove, touch any object or creature to store it inside the glove. Can store unlimited amount of objects. Living creatures can get out when they wish.

items.title: Neuralizer
items.description: In a flash, wipes the last hour of memories for everyone looking at it.

items.title: Vambrace of Octopus
items.description: Shoots out up to 8 thin, 10 meters long tentacles. Tentacles can grapple things and creatures, or deal 6 damage. Tentacles are strong enough to grasp a ledge of a building, and support your weight hanging on them.

items.title: Conman’s Paper
items.description: A sheet of paper that can be transformed to look like any official document.

items.title: Large Vitality Crystal
items.description: Automatically accumulates energy. Use it once per day to recover 8VT.

items.title: Holocrystal
items.description: Magic-powered smartphone.

items.title: Coconuts of the Monty
items.description: Two halves of a coconut, that when clapped together cause the user and up to 10 others to travel at the pace of a horse.

items.title: Wagon
items.description: Store currently unused items in it. Stash them in a wagon or put them back in your inventory when you have an hour to rest.

items.title: Steed
items.description: A horse or a horse-like creature you can ride.

items.title: Magic Lamp
items.description: Summons a Djinn who will perform any Spell or Skill of your choice. May grant other kinds of wishes (at the discretion of the GM). Can be used 3 times.

items.title: Supreme Spellbook
items.description: Allows you to learn any Supreme spell.

items.title: Supreme Skillbook
items.description: Allows you to learn any Supreme skill.

items.title: Resurrection Scroll
items.description: Allows you to resurrect a dead person.

items.title: Eye of Vance
items.description: Sees everything in 360 degrees and 100m radius around you. Can see through solid objects. Can see invisible objects. Can see anything hidden. Works twice per day for 10 minutes.

items.title: Invisibility Cloak
items.description: Turns the wearer invisible.

items.title: Stopwatch of Timelessness
items.description: Select up to 12 targets (people, creatures, objects). The time will pause for everything but them for up to 12 hours.

items.title: Imperius Collar
items.description: When it's put onto a person or a creature, you gain the ability to mind-control them and see through their senses. 5VT per day to maintain mind control.

items.title: Teleportation Key
items.description: Teleports you and up to 5 people who are touching it to any location you have ever personally visited. 1 hour cooldown.

items.title: Dimensional Gate
items.description: A pair of portals (large obsidian circles) connected by a wormhole.

items.title: Wand of Transfiguration
items.description: Once per day can transfigure any person into an animal.

items.title: Rememberball
items.description: Activate it to "Save Game". You can return to the saved state for the next 10 minutes. To "load game" more than once, spend extra 2VT.

items.title: Jack’s Compass
items.description: Points to the physical object you desire the most in life.

items.title: Horcrux
items.description: Stores a fragment of your soul in an item. After you die, you resurrect at the location of your horcrux.

items.title: Rook of Building
items.description: A small chess piece. When activated, it turns into any building or structure you describe (no larger than a tavern).

items.title: Pet Monster
items.description: Pet creature of your choice (Big Foot, Dinosaur, Wyvern, Griffin, Bear, etc.)

items.title: Time Chamber
items.description: Inside this room, the time moves 30 times faster. Live a month in this room - only a day will pass outside.

items.title: Wand
items.description: Make all spells 1VT cheaper.

items.title: Flying Vehicle
items.description: Your own zeppelin or an airship!

items.title: Custom Item
items.description: Come up with your own item! (create this card and then click on edit button to modify it)

equipment.title: Wagon
equipment.description: Store currently unused items in it. Stash them in a wagon or put them back in your inventory when you have an hour to rest.

equipment.title: Flying Vehicle
equipment.description: Your own zeppelin or an airship!
